Bases: LabelledGroupedObject

params(odor=ClassAttr, default_color=RandomizedColor, selected=Boolean, visible=Boolean, group=String, unique_id=String, name=String)

LarvaworldAgent base class for all agent types

Note that the setup() method is called right after initialization as in the agentpy.Agent class This is contrary to the parent class

Args: - odor: optional dictionary containing odor information of the agent.
